translations: n.电动剃须刀，剃毛器；理发师；<非正式>小伙子；<旧>骗子

phrs.translation: 电动刮胡刀；电动剃须刀

sentences.sentence: The shaver will run off batteries or mains.
sentences.translation: 这个剃须刀可用电池或电源驱动。

sentences.sentence: The shaver can be charged up and used when travelling.
sentences.translation: 这种电动剃须刀可充电供旅行使用。

sentences.sentence: The consumer was ultimately to be mentioned as well, especially by the likes of Dorothy Shaver, who could point to the sales figures at Lord & Taylor.
sentences.translation: 消费者最终也会被提及，尤其是被像多萝西·谢弗这样，可以指出罗德与泰勒百货的销售数据的人。
